description.value:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You have the dying condition and are about to attempt a recovery check.

The magic that animates you strains to keep you alive. You're restored to 1 Hit Point, lose the dying and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Unconscious]{Unconscious} conditions, and can act normally on this turn. You gain or increase the wounded condition as normal when losing the dying condition in this way.
